description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into fire. The user becomes a 'fire human' with complete immunity to conventional fire-based attacks.

userHistory.circumstanceObtained: Unknown - ate the fruit prior to Episode 94

abilities.description: Ace shoots a stream of fire from the palm of his hand. This technique can be used offensively or defensively, capable of neutralizing smoke-based attacks.
abilities.visualDescription: A concentrated stream of flames erupts from Ace's palm, creating a fiery barrier or projectile attack.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit Weakness - Sea Water
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, the user becomes unable to swim and is weakened when submerged in water.
Contact with Seastone negates the user's powers and weakens them significantly.

keyMoments.title: Mera Mera no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Ace reveals to Luffy that he ate the Mera Mera no Mi, making him a fire human.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of this powerful Logia-type Devil Fruit that will become significant in future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Kagero First Use
keyMoments.description: Ace uses his Kagero technique to block Smoker's White Blow attack, demonstrating the power of the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: First combat demonstration of the Mera Mera no Mi's abilities and its effectiveness against Smoker's Moku Moku no Mi.

culturalReferences.reference: The name 'Mera Mera' is onomatopoeia for the sound of fire burning in Japanese
culturalReferences.description: The fruit's name is derived from the Japanese sound effect for burning flames, which creates a memorable and fitting name for a fire-based Devil Fruit.
